page.title: 06ROTHERHAMS FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: {Rotherham's Football Club Rotherham's football ground is 101 years old and is known Millmoor. It is situated at Masborough, near the railway station which in past days provided transport for many spectators. A modern team needs an army of personnel to support it ranging from directors,managers, coaches, physiotherapists and doctors to clerical staff, ground staff laundry and cleaning staff and the ball boys. Sponsorship is a vital means of financing,especially when the gates have dwindled from 26,000 to 4,000. Additional funds are raised through the supporters clubs, refreshment bars and a football souvenir shop. Football violence is not present in Rotherham as rival teams are segregated and the police are vigilant
